__e: DEAC, THAT IS A MILLION-DOLLAR IDEA.
Maybe it was wrong of me to interfere like that, but why don't you let me save your company?
Well, I'm not sure that we have the right to interfere.
Of what are you guilty, I ask, that you object to her interfering?
Just where do you get off thinking you've got the right to butt into other people's business?
I don't want to tell you your business, but you really need to make amends with your wife about having a girlfriend.
Lady, he's your son... and I don't mean to interfere. But why don't you take it easy on the boy?
I don't want to pry but I'm here ifyou need to talk
